items.sentence: Tom is thirty years old, and Mary is thirteen years old.
I think that Tom will eat steak and potatoes for dinner.
I don't expect to hear any further details until Monday.
I sat on a park bench this morning and read a good book.
The way Mary is dressed today makes her look like a man.
I wish I were a kid again, so I could play on a see-saw.
Tom assumed the bracelet that he found belonged to Mary.
I doubt very seriously if Tom knows Mary's phone number.
We'd better get going before the traffic gets any worse.
I suspect that Tom and Mary don't need to do that today.
